ability: Push the Odds - While making an action roll, any time you roll a 3, you may take 1 fatigue to add an additional die to your roll and add it to the result (including any additional 3s that are rolled this way).
Double-Edged Senses - Once per roll, you may add 3 dice to any Sense action roll. Take 1 fatigue for every die in that roll with a value of 3.
memberCreatures: insects, arachnids, bugs, most creatures with exoskeletons

ability: Momentum - After making an action with Dodge, Dash, or Maneuver, your following action roll gains 2 dice.
memberCreatures: eagles, ravens, penguins, flamingos, all other birds

ability: Art of Theseus - When making an aspect art with exactly one aspect changed from your previous art, add 1 die to the action roll.
Reflection - When you take damage, gain one reflection point. At any time, spend any number of reflection points to add that many dice to an action roll.

Adaptation - After you make a low-impact action roll, gain one adaptation point. At any time, spend any number of adaptation points to add that many dice to an action roll (except rolls that gave you those points).
memberCreatures: dogs, foxes, wolves, cats, rabbits, mice, bears, raccoons
